                      throws Exception
        Perform the actions specified by this AdbCallable and return true on success.

        device - the IDevice to run against

      • forDevice

        public Callable<Boolean> forDevice(com.android.ddmlib.IDevice device)

        Parameters:
        device - the IDevice to run against.
        Returns:
        a Callable
